items.sentence: Tom is very overweight and gets upset when people tease him for being so.
Tom played the clarinet before he began learning how to play the bassoon.

The disagreement between the union and management could lead to a strike.
Whichever is better out of two options is also best out of those options.
The students observed as the teacher demonstrated the science experiment.
Tom was one of the people who stayed and helped clean up after the party.
Selling your old car for scrap might be a good way to make a bit of cash.
I didn't get to the bank before it closed because I got stuck in traffic.
Tom studies French for about half an hour every morning before breakfast.
